_aChangeLog.text: Fixed the final part where APC hp was an issue. Now permanently solved.
Fixed the infinite hp loop on the end where humans could add unlimited hp to the boss.

_sText:
Hi! This is my first surf map. And surprisingly made this map in just a day. Quite absurd but true.

Map Contains~
8 Surfs.
3 Defend Points. ( out of 1 will get repeated. i.e 4).
3/8 Surfs are Tier 1.
I wanted to add Tier8 Surf but that would prove to be a disaster. So, didn't added that.
1 Human Item. i.e LaserGun from ze_eerie_escape.
Good Music :)
Lasers with a Boss at the end. 

Map is comparatively harder than other Zombie Escape Surf maps, because of fast triggers, some defend points are harder without more humans. Overall, map is  short and really fun. I like de_dust2, so I made this map with de_dust2 layout and surprisingly it turned out to be great.
Took inspiration from some past surf maps such as surf_mom and as well as the legendary surf_vortex and surf_facility. Credit goes to all respective owners. . Chartapilus for his laser sfx.

YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO EDIT & RE-UPLOAD THIS MAP.
